item.title: Runescape music theme [delta]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I got some errors.

.\sign\signlink.java:128: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink if (musicSr != null) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:130: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink musicSr.stop(); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:131: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink musicSr.close(); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:133: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink musicSr = null; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:134: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicS location: class sign.signlink musicS = null; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:139: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicS location: class sign.signlink musicS = MidiSystem.getSequence(music); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:143: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink musicSr = MidiSystem.getSequencer(); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:144: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink musicSr.open(); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:145: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicS location: class sign.signlink musicSr.setSequence(musicS); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:145: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink musicSr.setSequence(musicS); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:146: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink musicSr.setLoopCount(musicSr.LOOP_CONTINUOUS LY); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:146: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink musicSr.setLoopCount(musicSr.LOOP_CONTINUOUS LY); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:147: cannot find symbol symbol : variable musicSr location: class sign.signlink musicSr.start(); ^ 13 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Shouldn’t
musicSr = MidiSystem.getSequencer();
be
Sequencer musicSR = MidiSystem.getSequencer();

?

Edit: I fixed your code. Made it this…

[code=Java]try {
Sequencer musicSr = MidiSystem.getSequencer();
File music = new File(midi);
Sequence musicS = MidiSystem.getSequence(music);
System.out.println("Play MIDI " + midi);
musicSr.open();
musicSr.setSequence(musicS);
musicSr.setLoopCount(musicSr.LOOP_CONTINUOUSLY);
musicSr.start();
if (musicSr != null)
{
musicSr.stop();
musicSr.close();
}
musicSr = null;
musicS = null;

                                if(music.exists())
                                {
                                    Sequence musicSe = MidiSystem.getSequence(music);
                                }[/code]

No errors, but the music doesn’t actually play…

Edit: Figured out why. You were making it nulled…
New code:

[code=Java]
try {
Sequencer musicSr = MidiSystem.getSequencer();
File music = new File(midi);
Sequence musicS = MidiSystem.getSequence(music);
System.out.println("Play MIDI " + midi);
musicSr.open();
musicSr.setSequence(musicS);
musicSr.setLoopCount(musicSr.LOOP_CONTINUOUSLY);
musicSr.start();
/if (musicSr != null)
{
musicSr.stop();
musicSr.close();
}
musicSr = null;
musicS = null;/

                                if(music.exists())
                                {
                                    Sequence musicSe = MidiSystem.getSequence(music);
                                }

                                // Create a sequencer for the sequence
                                
                                
                                
                            }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape music theme [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Pr0ject_pvp Pr0ject pvp
item.description:
@Pr0ject_pvp wrote:

Hey this is just basic Runescape music, when you load of the client it should start playing.
ive just added this in here because you need it for my tut in server tutorials.

server side:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

All you need to do is go into your signlink and replace this:

if(midiplay){ midi = s + savereq; //midiplay = false; try { //System.out.println("Play MIDI " + midi); if(musicSr != null){ musicSr.stop(); musicSr.close(); } musicSr = null; musicS = null; File music = new File(midi); if(music.exists()) { musicS = MidiSystem.getSequence(music); } // Create a sequencer for the sequence musicSr = MidiSystem.getSequencer(); musicSr.open(); musicSr.setSequence(musicS); musicSr.setLoopCount(musicSr.LOOP_CONTINUOUSLY); //musicSr.start(); } catch(Exception ex){ ex.printStackTrace(); } midiplay = false; } savereq = null; } else if(urlreq != null){ try { System.out.println("urlstream"); urlstream = new DataInputStream((new URL(mainapp.getCodeBase(), urlreq)).openStream()); } catch(Exception _ex){ urlstream = null; } urlreq = null; } try { Thread.sleep(50L); } catch(Exception _ex){ } } }

or somthing similar with

[code]if(midiplay)
{
/*
midi = s + savereq;
midiplay = false;
*/

                midi = s + savereq;
                            try {
                                //System.out.println("Play MIDI " + midi);
                                if (musicSr != null)
                                {
                                    musicSr.stop();
                                    musicSr.close();
                                }
                                musicSr = null;
                                musicS = null;
                                
                                File music = new File(midi);
                                if(music.exists())
                                {
                                    musicS = MidiSystem.getSequence(music);
                                }

                                // Create a sequencer for the sequence
                                musicSr = MidiSystem.getSequencer();
                                musicSr.open();
                                musicSr.setSequence(musicS);
                                musicSr.setLoopCount(musicSr.LOOP_CONTINUOUSLY);
                                musicSr.start();
                                
                            } catch (Exception ex) {
                                ex.printStackTrace();
                            }
                
                
                midiplay = false;
            
            }
            savereq = null;
        } else
        if(urlreq != null)
        {
            try
            {
                System.out.println("urlstream");
                urlstream = new DataInputStream((new URL(mainapp.getCodeBase(), urlreq)).openStream());
            }
            catch(Exception _ex)
            {
                urlstream = null;
            }
            urlreq = null;
        }
        try
        {
            Thread.sleep(50L);
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }
    }

}

[/code]

Now this should work with most deltas

credits to who ever wants them
